name: Lapaglia Contractors, Inc., Appellant, v. Baldwin Borough
name_abbreviation: Lapaglia Contractors, Inc. v. Baldwin Borough

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
parties: Lapaglia Contractors, Inc., Appellant, v. Baldwin Borough.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Order appealed from is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Montgomery.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Morris Zimmerman, with him Frank R. Sack, for appellant.
Maurice Louik, with him Harrison & Louik, and John Cx. Brosky, Solicitor, Borough of Baldwin, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Lapaglia Contractors, Inc., Appellant, v. Baldwin Borough.
Argued May 4, 1955.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
June 27, 1955:
Morris Zimmerman, with him Frank R. Sack, for appellant.
Maurice Louik, with him Harrison & Louik, and John Cx. Brosky, Solicitor, Borough of Baldwin, for appellees.
